attributes.action: Get Rid of Financial Services Authority (Not Police!)
attributes.additional_details: With shortages everywhere surely getting rid of paper pushers is better than lowering the budget of the police department or any other key service area's.  What have the FSA really done for us?? Stopped a few money launderers and given anyone working in financial services a headache at best!  Regulation is not a bad thing but when it gets so restrictive that the particular industry is suffocating then it's time for change.
